title: Miłosz Stępiński
text:
Miłosz Stępiński (born 1 August 1974) is a Polish <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="coach%20%28sport%29">manager</a>, currently coaching <a href="Poland%27s%20Women%20National%20under-20%20football%20team">Poland U-20</a>.
Between 2016–2021 he was the head coach of <a href="Poland%27s%20Women%20National%20football%20team">Poland's Women National Team</a>. On 23 March 2021 he was announced as the head coach of the <a href="Poland%20national%20under-20%20football%20team">Poland's U-20 National Team</a>.
He has a UEFA Pro license.
